thread.section_title: Pelican Water Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pelican Water Systems | pelicanwater.com
thread.title: Nena Rawson
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Nena Rawson

author: Nena Rawson
title: Nena Rawson
text: Salesman helpful and sent directly to consumer quickly but Pelican will tell you easy to install by consumer..not true. Had to hire a plumber to install because they had necessary tools needed for the installation so I spent additional $800. System still less expensive than other softners with installation.
